item.title: Food insecurity linked to tumor growth in pediatric neuroblastoma
item.description: Neuroblastoma remains one of the deadliest childhood malignancies, accounting for a disproportionate number of pediatric cancer deaths worldwide.

item.title: Quantifying the intensity of emotional response to sound, images and touch through skin conductance
